Body.Content:
Updated April 2, 2024: We have updated the rollout timeline below. Thank you for your patience.

Users will be able to control what shows in their activity feed by clicking on the ellipsis from the activity card, helping them to stay on top of the information that matters most to them.

This message is associated with Microsoft 365 Roadmap ID 186571

When this will happen:

Targeted Release: We will begin rolling out by mid-January 2024 and expect to complete by late January 2024.

Worldwide, GCC, GCC High and DoD: We will begin rolling out early February 2024 and expect to complete by late May 2024 (previously mid-March).

How this will affect your organization:

The experience will be available to all the new Teams users by default.


What you need to do to prepare:

You may consider updating your training and documentation as appropriate.

Details.Name: Summary
Details.Value: Users can control their activity feed by clicking on the ellipsis from the activity card. The rollout will begin by mid-January 2024 for Targeted Release and early February 2024 for Worldwide, GCC, GCC High, and DoD. The experience will be available to all new Teams users by default. No preparation is required, but updating training and documentation may be considered.

Title: Control your activity notifications from the activity card
